product_name: Coleman CPX 6 Classic XL LED Lantern
long_description: Take this water- and impact-resistant lantern on your next camping trip for up to 125 hrs. of warm LED light or a blast of 400-lumen illumination for critical camp tasks and locating gear in the dark.
short_description: Take this water- and impact-resistant lantern on your next camping trip for up to 125 hrs. of warm LED light or a blast of 400-lumen illumination for critical camp tasks and locating gear in the dark.
